properties.Name: ProductIngredient
properties.Description: The ingredients that are contained in the product.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: IngredientId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Ingredient.

Columns.Name: ProductIngredientPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated Product Ingredient was used in the product.

Columns.Name: ProductIngredientPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated Product Ingredient was used in the product.

Columns.Name: TotalIngredient
Columns.Description:
The total amount of associated ingredient in a single serving.

Ex:
Ex" 4g total sugar per serving

Columns.Name: TotalIngredientUomId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Unit Of Measure.

Columns.Name: ActiveIngredientIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the ingredient is considered an active ingredient or not.

Columns.Name: SubstituteIngredientIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the recipe resulting ingredients may have used the ingredient as a substitute or alternate for another ingredient.

Columns.Name: MayContainIngredientIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the recipe resulting ingredients may contain the ingredient. This is usually as a result of the ingredient being used elsewhere in the manufacturing facility and it may have come in contact with the production process. Commonly used for items such as peanuts where some individuals are highly allergic.

Columns.Name: AlternateIngredientName
Columns.Description: The alternate name of an Ingredient as provided by a specified source.

Columns.Name: AlternateIngredientNameSourcePartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: RecipeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a recipe.

Columns.Name: ProductIngredientNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the product ingredient.
